scripts.build: npm run remove-build-folders && npm run build-app && npm run copy-to-dist && npm run minify && echo Done!
scripts.database-update: npm run remove-build-folders && dotnet ef database update -p ..\Pokedex.DataAccess\Pokedex.DataAccess.csproj -c DataContext
scripts.remove-build-folders: rimraf .dist && npm run remove-pokedex-build && npm run remove-pokedex-data-access-folder
scripts.minify-css: npm run minify-main-css && npm run minify-pageLookup-css && npm run minify-typeChart-css && npm run minify-pokemonPage-css
scripts.minify: npm run minify-css & npm run minify-js
